name: Sonic Chao Space(fangame) (OPEN BETA)
description:
You live in the Sonic universe (not the original, my own version) and live in Spagonia. One day, you meet Sonic, who is in big trouble.  All his friends, except Tails and Cream, have been taken by the Metarex. Will you save them all? Explore many unique worlds and add characters from the various official Sonic stories to your character roster. The game even includes a fully functional Chao garden, and monthly events!

I have put 3 fanmade characters I saw in the game. This game also rewrites a lot,  and I mean that, a LOT of Sonic lore.

This is a beta, so anything you see will likely change in the future.

If you have any bugs to report, please tell me in the bug section of the discussion board.
